titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament Die Mercurii 10. May, 1643.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iohn Wright in the Old-baily,

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed at end: Die Martis 16. May; 1643. Ordered by the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, that this declaration shall be forthwith printed and published. John Browne Cler. Parliamentorum.
A declaration of Parliament concerning the execution of an ordinance for taxing certain parishes in London.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
